p: In veterinary personnel, faecal carriage of colistin‐resistant E. coli (6%), ESBL‐producing E. coli (6%) and CP‐ E. coli (1%), and nasal carriage of MRSA (7%), MRSP (1%) and MRCoNS (5%) were found. MDRO carriage was not associated with work place or profession of the person. The CP‐ E. coli ( bla OXA‐181) from a staff member of clinic B was related to environmental isolates.
